meanings.definition: The quality or state of being stylish.
meanings.sent1: Her outfit exuded stylishness at the party.
meanings.sent2: Many people admire her sense of stylishness.
meanings.sent3: The catwalk model strutted with such stylishness that even the pigeons were impressed.
meanings.sent4: Her stylishness was like a beacon of light in a sea of dullness.
meanings.sent5: The stylishness of her home decor left a lasting impression on all who visited.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being fashionable or trendy.
meanings.sent1: His stylishness in choosing clothes always turns heads.
meanings.sent2: The magazine cover showcased the latest stylishness in fashion.
meanings.sent3: The penguin waddled with a hint of stylishness, trying to keep up with the fashion-forward seals.
meanings.sent4: The stylishness of her accessories added a touch of glamour to her overall look.
meanings.sent5: The stylishness of the new smartphone design made it a must-have for tech enthusiasts.
